column2: ICAO: WAPD) is an airport in Dobo
column3: the main city in the Aru Islands
column4: in the Maluku province of eastern Indonesia. There are regular scheduled flights by Wings Air and Trigana Air Service to Ambon from this airport. The airport resides at an elevation of 17 m (57 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 05/23 with an asphalt surface measuring 800 m (2
column5: 625 ft) in length. Address: Jl. Cenderawasih Kel. Wangel
column6: Kec. Pulau-Pulau Aru Kab. Kepulauan Aru Maluku 97662 Indonesia Tel: +62 917 21667
